mapper.sql: a.channel_carr_id AS "channelCarrId", a.carr_id AS "carrId", a.channel_id AS "channelId", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.create_user_id AS "createUserId", a.is_weight_or_cnt AS "isWeightOrCnt"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_channel_carriage( channel_carr_id, carr_id, channel_id, create_time, create_user_id, is_weight_or_cnt ) VALUES ( #{channelCarrId}, #{carrId}, #{channelId}, #{createTime}, #{createUserId}, #{isWeightOrCnt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_channel_carriage SET channel_carr_id = #{channelCarrId}, carr_id = #{carrId}, channel_id = #{channelId}, create_time = #{createTime}, create_user_id = #{createUserId}, is_weight_or_cnt = #{isWeightOrCnt} WHERE id = #{id}
